name: Dungeon Rustlers
description: Collect loot. Kill Monsters. Do it Quickly. Oh...and DON'T DIE! Quickly navigate your character through a series of levels filled with monsters trying to take you down. Unlock class-specific power-ups, minions, and other bonuses to help you on your quest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any card which supports DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
